parameters: \nr<Vio>Sorry to have burdened you. I'll follow after once
I heal up. Don't worry, I won't be long.

nearby. We can't turn back now.
\n<Gale>I think this is the monster that the quest mentioned!
\nr<Vio>I never ran into one of these when I was up here!
\nr<Vio>Alright, Miss Gale. Let's show them what we can do!
\n<Gale>That was way easier than fighting monsters solo!
\nr<Vio>Oh, right. You've been fighting on your own since
\nr<Vio>I hope I've been a good party member for you.
\n<Gale>I've only ever been with Master, so working with
somebody else feels new... It's a bit refreshing...
\n<Gale>Ah! Master! That doesn't mean that I've gotten
\nr<Vio>Heheh~! I wouldn't worry. All adventurers have to
party up with someone new eventually. I think he'd be
happy to know you're getting used to me.
\nr<Alain>Heh. She's not wrong. Gale was an
adventurer newbie a little while ago. Now
\nr<Est>If she's grown up, you've shrunken down. Come on. I'm
curious what this Condensed Magic Core could be used
\nr<Alain>Oh right. Yeah, let's take that to Mirie.
\nr<Fox Beastkin>Tch. You're pretty good. That was my sixth poisoned
kunai that you managed to block.
\nc<Wolf Beastkin>Heh. Those blunt fruit knives of yours don't even
tickle. Even those demons I killed were stronger.
\nc<Wolf Beastkin>Come on! I've been bored and you've been hunting
my prey, so you better have enough stamina to satisfy
\nr<Fox Beastkin>Her blows are so heavy... I was hunting
strong chimeras, but she's on a whole different level.
\nr<Fox Beastkin>And those attacks... She's going in for
\n<Gale>There's two beastkin. And the one we met's actually
\n<Alain>Looks like we got here during a serious
fight. That wolf girl's seriously trying to
\n<Alain>I don't know what's going on, but be
\nr<Fox Beastkin>Huh? Another person? Ah! It's that super strong
\nr<Fox Beastkin>Excuse me! It's me! Vio! We had a lovely bonding
\nr<Vio>A little help would be appreciated! This crazy
\n<Alain>That's not something to be happy about
right now, Gale. That got the wolf's
\nc<Wolf Beastkin>Haah? A friend of yours came along? I'll
\nc<Wolf Beastkin>Tch! Back at the dungeon crawling again, huh? Well,
while the Boss is out, I won't let an over-grown
\nr<Vio>I appreciate the distraction. You're wide open!
\nc<Wolf Beastkin>Heh. Two against one's nothing. Bring it!
The Fox Beastkin, Vio, has joined your party!
\nc<Wolf Beastkin>Tch...! Not if I can get away from here!
\n<Gale>Oh no! Are you okay, Miss Vio?
\nr<Vio>Unfortunately, it looks like that last attack got
my legs - I won't be able to walk for a bit.
\nr<Vio>But more importantly, you should go after her.
\nr<Vio>I was just out here hunting chimeras for food when
she came out of nowhere talking about demons and prey.
\nr<Vio>I don't know what she's plotting, but she's clearly
\n<Gale>Demons? That's right. She did mention that earlier.
\n<Alain>Looks like we got lucky. We made the
wrong guess the first time, but we still
managed to find the actual person who has
that wolf girl right now or we'll lose her.
\n<Gale>(It looks like she dropped a ring too... I'll
hang on to this one too.)
Obtained a Broken Ring of Wind!
\nc<Wolf Beastkin>Heh. Gotcha! It's my win. Hyah!
\nc<Wolf Beastkin>Looks like you've gotten a lot weaker! Don't worry.
this! We've managed to survive worse!
\n<Gale>Nghh... Grk... Gah...! It's no use. I'm out of mana...
\n<Alain>What? We need to get you to somewhere
safe so your body can recover then!
\n<Wolf Beastkin>Hmph. Recover, was it? I think it's too late for that.
\n<Wolf Beastkin>Heh. Looks like your boobs didn't cushion him enough.
That takes care of one more annoying adventurer.
\n<Wolf Beastkin>What, are you angry? I was just crushing
a bug. Those Cursed Rings sure are doing their job,
\n<Gale>Cursed...? You know? Then that means you're-?!
\n<Wolf Beastkin>Heh. I don't have to answer that. It's already too
late for either of you two to do anything.
Even with the help of the fox shinobi, Vio, Gale was
unable to defeat the powerful Wolf Beastkin.
Dragon Rider Alain had managed to get out onto her
bosom to advise her, but he was quickly crushed under
The Dragon Rider now nothing more than a stain between
the wolf's foot and her bosom, Gale had lost not just
With the wolf beastkin's agenda unfolding, the two
adventurers and the fox beastkin were never to be
